docs.title: Isaac AI Robot Brain Curriculum
docs.description: Welcome to the comprehensive curriculum for developing AI-powered humanoid robots using the NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem. This course will take you from basic simulation concepts to advanced Vision-Language-Action systems.

docs.title: Module 1: Isaac Sim Basics
docs.description: This module covers the fundamental concepts of Isaac Sim and how to work with the simulation environment effectively.

docs.title: Module 1: Exercises
docs.description: Complete these exercises to practice the concepts learned in Module 1.

docs.title: Module 1: Isaac Sim Setup
docs.description: This module introduces you to NVIDIA Isaac Sim, a powerful robotics simulation environment. You'll learn how to set up your development environment and create your first simulated robot.

docs.title: Module 2: ROS 2 Communication Patterns
docs.description: This module covers advanced ROS 2 communication patterns including topics, services, and actions for robot control.

docs.title: Module 2: Exercises
docs.description: Complete these exercises to practice ROS 2 concepts learned in Module 2.

docs.title: Module 2: ROS 2 Fundamentals
docs.description: This module introduces you to Robot Operating System (ROS 2), the middleware framework for robotics applications. You'll learn how to create nodes, topics, services, and actions.

docs.title: Assessment Materials for Isaac AI Robot Brain
docs.description: This document outlines the assessment materials for evaluating student understanding and implementation of the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum.

docs.title: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac)
docs.description: Welcome to Module 3 of the AI-Robotics curriculum, focusing on the AI-Robot Brain using NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem. This module covers advanced topics in AI perception, navigation, and intelligent control of humanoid robots using Isaac Sim, Isaac ROS, and Nav2.

docs.title: Isaac AI Robot Brain Curriculum
docs.description: Welcome to the Isaac AI Robot Brain curriculum, where you'll learn to develop AI-powered humanoid robotics using the NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem. This module builds upon your existing knowledge of ROS 2 and simulation from Modules 1 & 2.

next.title: Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation and Synthetic Data Generation

docs.description: This guide covers integrating AI navigation with Isaac ROS perception for intelligent robot navigation.

docs.title: Isaac ROS: VSLAM and Perception Pipelines
docs.description: Welcome to the Isaac ROS section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on implementing visual SLAM (VSLAM) and perception pipelines using Isaac ROS to enable the robot to understand its environment and navigate intelligently.

next.title: AI Navigation Guide for Isaac ROS

docs.title: Perception Pipelines Guide for Isaac ROS
docs.description: This guide covers implementing perception pipelines using Isaac ROS for object detection, segmentation, and other perception tasks.

docs.description: This guide covers setting up Visual SLAM (VSLAM) systems using Isaac ROS for humanoid robot perception and navigation.

docs.title: Isaac Sim Exercises
docs.description: This section contains hands-on exercises to practice Isaac Sim concepts for humanoid robot simulation and synthetic data generation.

docs.title: Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation and Synthetic Data Generation
docs.description: Welcome to the Isaac Sim section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on creating photorealistic humanoid simulations and generating synthetic data for AI perception and navigation systems.

docs.title: Photorealistic Simulation Guide
docs.description: This guide will help you create photorealistic humanoid robot simulations in Isaac Sim with advanced lighting, materials, and rendering settings.

docs.title: Isaac Sim Setup Guide
docs.description: This guide will walk you through setting up Isaac Sim for humanoid robot simulation with photorealistic rendering capabilities.

previous.title: Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation and Synthetic Data Generation

docs.title: Synthetic Data Generation Guide
docs.description: This guide will help you generate high-quality synthetic datasets for AI training using Isaac Sim's photorealistic humanoid robot simulations.

docs.title: Bipedal Navigation Guide for Humanoid Robots
docs.description: This guide covers implementing navigation behaviors specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2.

docs.title: Nav2: Path Planning for Bipedal Humanoid Movement
docs.description: Welcome to the Nav2 section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on implementing path planning algorithms specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2 to enable robots to navigate complex environments with human-like locomotion.
